verses.name: Numbers 7:51
verses.text: One young bullock, one ram, one lamb of the first year, for a burnt offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:52
verses.text: One kid of the goats for a sin offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:53
verses.text: And for a sacrifice of peace offerings, two oxen, five rams, five he goats, five lambs of the first year: this was the offering of Elishama the son of Ammihud.

verses.name: Numbers 7:54
verses.text: On the eighth day offered Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur, prince of the children of Manasseh:
